name: Passing
description:
Passing

Passing was made for Super Love Jam in 2014.

In this game you are a triangle, but you live in a world of squares and circles.

You are trying to make your way in the world, maintaining your triangliness and achieving your goals.

Going around in hostile environments tires you, but so does trying to hide what makes you... you.

Made for the Super Love Jam #sljnyc

Code: Alex Lew, J. Shepard Ramsey, Tarek Chaya

Level Design: @edbles, Tarek Chaya

Art and Audio: Nick
